era,"},{"lineNumber":70812,"originalJapaneseLine":"　織田家で将軍してたランス様達と知り合いに","translatedEnglishLine":"and met Lord Rance and others who were generals of the Oda clan."},{"lineNumber":70813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、そんな時、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And at such a time,"},{"lineNumber":70814,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ザビエルの使徒に襲われる健太郎くん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro was attacked by the apostle of Demon Xavier!"},{"lineNumber":70815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「瀕死の健太郎くんを救う為、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To save the near-death Kentaro,"},{"lineNumber":70816,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹ちゃんは涙ながらに健太郎くんに","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki-chan tearfully sent her blood into him."},{"lineNumber":70817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分の血を送り込みます」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":70818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これにより一命を取り止めた健太郎くん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thanks to this, Kentaro survived,"},{"lineNumber":70819,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかしその体は魔人と化してしまったのでした","translatedEnglishLine":"but his body had transformed into a demon."},{"lineNumber":70820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でもまったく後悔はないんですって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But he has absolutely no regrets."},{"lineNumber":70821,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹ちゃんが無事だったから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Miki-chan was safe.\""},{"lineNumber":70822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……愛、よねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's love, isn’t it.\""},{"lineNumber":70823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに健太郎くんは剣道部主将！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, Kentaro is the captain of the kendo club!"},{"lineNumber":70824,"originalJapaneseLine":"　小川わたるという弟がいるわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"He has a younger brother named Wataru Ogawa!\""},{"lineNumber":70825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、ざっと健太郎くん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, that’s a quick summary of Kentaro-kun,"},{"lineNumber":70826,"originalJapaneseLine":"　および二人のあらすじはこんな感じ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and their story like this!\""},{"lineNumber":70827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに健太郎くんは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, 'Kentaro-kun' is not spelled as 'Kentaro-kun' with kanji '君'."},{"lineNumber":70828,"originalJapaneseLine":"　健太郎君ではなく健太郎くん。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s 'くん' with hiragana, not '君' with kanji."},{"lineNumber":70829,"originalJapaneseLine":"　健太郎くんは健太郎くんだから健太郎くんなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro-kun is Kentaro-kun because it’s Kentaro-kun.\""},{"lineNumber":70830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だそうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s what they say.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから伸びた触手がするすると対象に寄生し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tentacle extended from here smoothly parasitizes the target,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その相手を自由自在に操るってわけ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and controls that opponent freely!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー、えげつなーい！　素敵ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa, that's brutal! Wonderful!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼球ぺろってしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to lick eyeballs."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そんなレッドアイ様の目的は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, the purpose of such Lord Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勝利なんてまーったく無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: completely ignores the victory of the Demon Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生き物を殺したい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He wants to kill living creatures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分を更に強くしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and wants to become even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たったこの二つだけが行動目的」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two alone are his purpose for action."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これがシンプルでデジタルな解答って奴かいのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is what you call a simple and digital answer, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなレッドアイ様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for such Lord Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどのようになるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what he will become from now on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは本編でどうぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’ll have to see in the main story!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　健太郎くーん！　こっち向いてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa! Kentaro-kun! Look this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで今回は逃亡魔人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, this time it's about the fugitive demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんについての解説よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll explain about Kentaro-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼は全ての魔人の中で唯一、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He is the only one among all demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王リトルプリンセスによって魔人と化した人ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who became a demon by the Demon King Little Princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然、元々は普通の人間だったのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, he was originally an ordinary human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、それではざっくりと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, I'll give a rough explanation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんの説明いっくよー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about Kentaro-kun!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた、よく聞いててね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, listen carefully!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本名は小川健太郎くん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His real name is Kentaro Ogawa."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼はあなたのいる世界とよく似た異界、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He lived in a parallel world similar to yours,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次元3E2という世界でガールフレンド美樹ちゃんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: called Dimension 3E2, where he spent peaceful days with his girlfriend Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても平和な日常を過ごしていたわ
「そんなある日、魔王ガイに美樹ちゃんをさらわれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One day, Miki-chan was kidnapped by the Demon King Guy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てて追いかける健太郎くん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kentaro hurriedly chased after him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美樹ちゃんを魔王にされたものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although Miki-chan was turned into a demon king,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか魔王ガイを打ち倒し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro somehow defeated Demon King Guy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんを取り戻すことに成功したわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and succeeded in rescuing Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな二人の目的は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The goal of these two is to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王化をなんとかして止めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow stop the demon king transformation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元いた世界に帰ること」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and return to their original world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなこんなで二人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, the two of them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと約七年間もこの世界で冒険を続けているわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have continued adventuring in this world for about seven years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、どうやって魔人と化したのかの説明を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, for the explanation on how he became a demon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、美樹ちゃんの魔王化を止める旅の途中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, during their journey to stop Miki-chan’s demon king transformation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦乱時代まっただ中のJAPANに立ち寄った際に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they stopped by JAPAN, in the middle of a war-torn era,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田家で将軍してたランス様達と知り合いに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and met Lord Rance and others who were generals of the Oda clan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、そんな時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And at such a time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ザビエルの使徒に襲われる健太郎くん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro was attacked by the apostle of Demon Xavier!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「瀕死の健太郎くんを救う為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To save the near-death Kentaro,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんは涙ながらに健太郎くんに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki-chan tearfully sent her blood into him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の血を送り込みます」
「これにより一命を取り止めた健太郎くん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to this, Kentaro survived,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしその体は魔人と化してしまったのでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but his body had transformed into a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもまったく後悔はないんですって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But he has absolutely no regrets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんが無事だったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Miki-chan was safe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……愛、よねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's love, isn’t it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに健太郎くんは剣道部主将！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, Kentaro is the captain of the kendo club!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小川わたるという弟がいるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has a younger brother named Wataru Ogawa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、ざっと健太郎くん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, that’s a quick summary of Kentaro-kun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: および二人のあらすじはこんな感じ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their story like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに健太郎くんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, 'Kentaro-kun' is not spelled as 'Kentaro-kun' with kanji '君'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君ではなく健太郎くん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s 'くん' with hiragana, not '君' with kanji.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんは健太郎くんだから健太郎くんなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro-kun is Kentaro-kun because it’s Kentaro-kun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s what they say."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Kentaro-kun.\""},{"lineNumber":70830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だそうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s what they say.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから伸びた触手がするすると対象に寄生し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tentacle extended from here smoothly parasitizes the target,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その相手を自由自在に操るってわけ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and controls that opponent freely!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー、えげつなーい！　素敵ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa, that's brutal! Wonderful!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼球ぺろってしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to lick eyeballs."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そんなレッドアイ様の目的は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, the purpose of such Lord Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勝利なんてまーったく無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: completely ignores the victory of the Demon Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生き物を殺したい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He wants to kill living creatures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分を更に強くしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and wants to become even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たったこの二つだけが行動目的」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two alone are his purpose for action."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これがシンプルでデジタルな解答って奴かいのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is what you call a simple and digital answer, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなレッドアイ様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for such Lord Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどのようになるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what he will become from now on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは本編でどうぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’ll have to see in the main story!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　健太郎くーん！　こっち向いてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa! Kentaro-kun! Look this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで今回は逃亡魔人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, this time it's about the fugitive demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんについての解説よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll explain about Kentaro-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼は全ての魔人の中で唯一、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He is the only one among all demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王リトルプリンセスによって魔人と化した人ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who became a demon by the Demon King Little Princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然、元々は普通の人間だったのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, he was originally an ordinary human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、それではざっくりと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, I'll give a rough explanation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんの説明いっくよー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about Kentaro-kun!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた、よく聞いててね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, listen carefully!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本名は小川健太郎くん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His real name is Kentaro Ogawa."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼はあなたのいる世界とよく似た異界、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He lived in a parallel world similar to yours,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次元3E2という世界でガールフレンド美樹ちゃんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: called Dimension 3E2, where he spent peaceful days with his girlfriend Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても平和な日常を過ごしていたわ
「そんなある日、魔王ガイに美樹ちゃんをさらわれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One day, Miki-chan was kidnapped by the Demon King Guy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てて追いかける健太郎くん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kentaro hurriedly chased after him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美樹ちゃんを魔王にされたものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although Miki-chan was turned into a demon king,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか魔王ガイを打ち倒し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro somehow defeated Demon King Guy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんを取り戻すことに成功したわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and succeeded in rescuing Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな二人の目的は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The goal of these two is to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王化をなんとかして止めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow stop the demon king transformation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元いた世界に帰ること」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and return to their original world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなこんなで二人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, the two of them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと約七年間もこの世界で冒険を続けているわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have continued adventuring in this world for about seven years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、どうやって魔人と化したのかの説明を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, for the explanation on how he became a demon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、美樹ちゃんの魔王化を止める旅の途中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, during their journey to stop Miki-chan’s demon king transformation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦乱時代まっただ中のJAPANに立ち寄った際に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they stopped by JAPAN, in the middle of a war-torn era,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田家で将軍してたランス様達と知り合いに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and met Lord Rance and others who were generals of the Oda clan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、そんな時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And at such a time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ザビエルの使徒に襲われる健太郎くん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro was attacked by the apostle of Demon Xavier!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「瀕死の健太郎くんを救う為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To save the near-death Kentaro,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんは涙ながらに健太郎くんに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki-chan tearfully sent her blood into him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の血を送り込みます」
「これにより一命を取り止めた健太郎くん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to this, Kentaro survived,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしその体は魔人と化してしまったのでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but his body had transformed into a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもまったく後悔はないんですって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But he has absolutely no regrets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんが無事だったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Miki-chan was safe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……愛、よねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's love, isn’t it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに健太郎くんは剣道部主将！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, Kentaro is the captain of the kendo club!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小川わたるという弟がいるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has a younger brother named Wataru Ogawa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、ざっと健太郎くん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, that’s a quick summary of Kentaro-kun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: および二人のあらすじはこんな感じ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their story like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに健太郎くんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, 'Kentaro-kun' is not spelled as 'Kentaro-kun' with kanji '君'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君ではなく健太郎くん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s 'くん' with hiragana, not '君' with kanji.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんは健太郎くんだから健太郎くんなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro-kun is Kentaro-kun because it’s Kentaro-kun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s what they say."
